text: La hantise () is a 1912 short silent film directed by Louis Feuillade. The film stars Renée Carl and René Navarre. The film focuses on a woman who is told by a palm reader that one of her loved ones will die. The woman then tries to convince her husband not to board the RMS Titanic, as she fears for his safety. The film is said to confront the fraud of palm reading, highlighting the suffering that obsessive belief in the supernatural can create. ==Cast== *Renée Carl as Madame Trévoux *René Navarre as Jean Trévoux *Miss Édith as The Palmist *Henri Jullien as Madame Trévoux' Godfather *Maurice Mathieu as Little Georges ==References== ==External links== * * Category:French silent short films Category:French films Category:1912 films Category:French silent films Category:French black-and-white films
title: La hantise
